      • getCentrifugalVector

        public static Vector2 getCentrifugalVector(Vector2 o,
                                           Vector2 v,
                                           Vector2 p)
        Find the vector whose origin is point p, moving perpendicularly away from (origin, v) and length is 1
        Parameters:
        o - origin of departure of v
        v - vector of direction departing from origin
        p - point of depart
        Returns:
        null if p is on the line passing by o with v as directing vector
